name: Tales of a Junktown Jerky Vendor
name_plural: Tales of a Junktown Jerky Vendor
//: Biz majors can afford it.  Surely you're gonna make US$60K/yr out of school, and twice that in five years?
description: A book of stories from a fictional apocalyptic town. In between the anecdotes are some actually good tips on running a business, and some recipes for 'iguana'...
